title: Bloomberg Markets: Lewis on Opportunities in Small Caps
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Lewis on Opportunities in Small Caps
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Miles Lewis Portfolio Manager American Century Investments Discussing how small caps continue to bring income to investors and investing in companies including like Graphic Packaging and Penske Auto.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
